description:
This course is specifically designed for women who are stuck in life and want to get unstuck.

It serves as a catalyst to help you to put into action what you may already know.

Many of us use four of the most dangerous words that keep us exactly where we are -- "I already know that".

  • It is intended as overview of my proprietary system to stop making
    EXCUSES and BOOST your productivity.

  • The course is entirely video-based for your viewing pleasure.

  • Plan on investing 20 MINUTES or less of your time to complete the course.


If you've ever felt that life just seems so routine and you're operating on autopilot, then this easy to watch course will show you where you got lost and remind you what to do.

It's time to add excitement to your lifestyle and get out of a rut, starting today.

It's time to imagine your possibilities!

Michelle Greene, 0Lifestyle Design Strategist
Author of No More Big Buts
title: 7 Simple Steps  to Add Excitement To Your Lifestyle
